summary: 子ども同士がペットについて話している簡単な会話。
母親と息子が週末の予定を相談する短い対話。
友人同士が電話で映画に行く計画を立てている会話。
A teacher gives a short announcement about a coming school field trip.
Two coworkers are discussing preparations for an upcoming business meeting.
A radio news report describes a recent environmental conservation event in the local community.
A scientist is giving a presentation on new findings in renewable energy research.
